column1: ruth irene schultz| ruth irene schultz (march 19
column3: 2015) send sympathy card the funeral for ruth brown schultz will be wednesday
column5: 2015 at 2:00pm in the henninger-hinson funeral home chapel. pastor dan thimell will officiate. burial will follow in memorial park cemetery. ruth was born march 19
column7: oklahoma to thomas and ruby (mc. cart) bothwell and died friday
column9: 2015 in highland park manor in enid. she attended local schools and moved to enid in 1957. she was a care-giver in the health care industry for 20 years. she was a member of faith fellowship church
column13: and a life-time member of the ladies of the vfw. she enjoyed dancing and playing cards. she is survived by her daughter linette romer and husband robert elliott
column15: four grandchildren; bella and tristian romer
column21: cheryl bothwell and carol schultz and several nieces
column23: and cousins. she was preceded in death by her parents
column27: and brothers and sisters. condolences may be made to the family online at www. enidwecare. com print back
